name: part_008
file: tmp_【#湊あくあ卒業ライブ】あくあ色に染まれ！／MinatoAqua Graduation LIVE [fDtUy1PTor0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Summertime Record' featuring Minato Aqua, Suisei Hoshimachi, and Tokoyami Towa.
Performance of 'Kizuna to Kiseki' with Minato Aqua and various Hololive members appearing on screens.

subtitles.original: 「忘れないでさぁ、進もう」
subtitles.english: "Don't forget it, let's move forward."

subtitles.original: もどかしさに何度でも
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I feel frustrated,

subtitles.original: 明日を夢に見てた
subtitles.english: I was dreaming of tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 戻らない 先のある世界へ
subtitles.english: To a world that won't go back, a world with a future,

subtitles.original: 「僕たちで変えよう」
subtitles.english: "Let's change it ourselves."

subtitles.original: 「思い出して、終わったって」
subtitles.english: "Remember, even if it's over,"

subtitles.original: 「秘密基地も、冒険も」
subtitles.english: "the secret base, the adventure,"

subtitles.original: あの日に迷い込んだ
subtitles.english: the story that we strayed into

subtitles.original: 話の事も
subtitles.english: on that day.

subtitles.original: 独りぼっちが集まった
subtitles.english: Loners gathered together,

subtitles.original: 子供たちの作戦が
subtitles.english: the children's plan

subtitles.original: また今日も廻り出した
subtitles.english: started turning again today.

subtitles.original: 「また、何処かで。」
subtitles.english: "Somewhere again."

subtitles.original: 「涼しいね」って言い合った
subtitles.english: We said to each other, "It's cool, isn't it?"

subtitles.original: 夏空は透明だ
subtitles.english: The summer sky is transparent.

subtitles.original: 泣かない様に、吸い込んで
subtitles.english: Inhale so you don't cry,

subtitles.original: 「さようなら」しよう
subtitles.english: and let's say "goodbye."

subtitles.original: 秘密基地に集まって
subtitles.english: Gathering at the secret base

subtitles.original: 笑い合った夏の日に
subtitles.english: on that summer day when we laughed together,

subtitles.original: また何処かで思い出して
subtitles.english: remembering it again somewhere,

subtitles.original: 出会えるかなって
subtitles.english: wondering if we can meet again.

subtitles.original: 何度でも描こう
subtitles.english: Let's draw it over and over again.

subtitles.original: 明日の明日もきっと 一人じゃ辿り着けない
subtitles.english: Even the day after tomorrow, I probably can't reach it alone.

subtitles.original: 涙の数の想いだけ 伝えたい
subtitles.english: I just want to convey as many feelings as the number of tears.

subtitles.original: あの日始まった 絆結ぶ 戸惑いの日々
subtitles.english: Those bewildering days when the bond began,

subtitles.original: 気が付けば 近付く心の距離
subtitles.english: before we knew it, the distance between our hearts shortened.

subtitles.original: うまく紡げない 言葉だけど 不器用なりに
subtitles.english: The words don't come out right, but in my own clumsy way,

subtitles.original: 歩いてきた 軌跡 巡る 奇跡
subtitles.english: the trajectory we've walked is a recurring miracle.

subtitles.original: いつか 枯れる運命でも 咲き誇る 花でいたい
subtitles.english: Even if it's fated to wither someday, I want to be a flower in full bloom.

subtitles.original: いつか 褪せる想いでも まだ夢見たいから
subtitles.english: Even if the feelings fade someday, I still want to dream.

subtitles.original: そうでしょ？
subtitles.english: Isn't that right?

subtitles.original: 明日の明日もきっと 一人じゃ辿り着けない
subtitles.english: Even the day after tomorrow, I probably can't reach it alone.

subtitles.original: 涙の数の想いだけ 心に 溢れてる
subtitles.english: Just as many feelings as the number of tears are overflowing in my heart.

subtitles.original: それでも 最後はあのように いつか消えてしまうのなら
subtitles.english: Even so, if in the end it disappears like that one day,

subtitles.original: 伝え足りない気持ち 君に届くように
subtitles.english: so that the feelings I haven't conveyed enough can reach you,

subtitles.original: そっと今 願う
subtitles.english: I gently pray now.

subtitles.original: 振り返れば今世 あの日見た可能性
subtitles.english: Looking back on this life, the possibility I saw that day,

subtitles.original: 過去は未来への標 ふいに重なって解けて
subtitles.english: the past is a signpost to the future, suddenly overlapping and unraveling.

subtitles.original: ずっと うまく伝わらない でもいつだって感じてたよ
subtitles.english: It hasn't always come across well, but I've always felt it.

subtitles.original: きっと 出会いの意味は僕らが 決めるもの
subtitles.english: Surely, the meaning of our meeting is something we decide.

subtitles.original: そうでしょ？
subtitles.english: Isn't that right?

subtitles.original: 明日の明日もきっと 大袈裟な未来じゃなくても
subtitles.english: Even the day after tomorrow, even if it's not a grand future,

subtitles.original: 涙の数の絆で これから 幸せで
subtitles.english: with bonds as many as the number of tears, may there be happiness from now on.

subtitles.original: それでも 泣いたり笑ったり 傷付くこともあるでしょう
subtitles.english: Even so, there will be times when we cry, laugh, or get hurt.

subtitles.original: これまであった奇跡 いつも思い出して
subtitles.english: Always remember the miracles we've had until now.
